Description: Fragment of body (near to shoulder?) of Attic black-figure painted pottery amphora; tongues: part of helmet.
Curator's comments: Fragment of amphora of same type as CVA BM pl. GB 607, 2-4.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (p. 58, X. 24)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 74)
